actions.text: Amendment SA 1065 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 69 - 29. Record Vote Number: 251.

Amendment SA 1065 proposed by Senator Bingaman. (consideration: CR S8502; text: CR S8502) To update, beginning in 2009, the asset or resource test used for purposes of determining the eligibility of low-income beneficiaries for premium and cost-sharing subsidies.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1065 proposed by Senator Bingaman.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Amendment SA 1065 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 69 - 29. Record Vote Number: 251.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1065 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 69 - 29. Record Vote Number: 251.

purpose: To update, beginning in 2009, the asset or resource test used for purposes of determining the eligibility of low-income beneficiaries for premium and cost-sharing subsidies.
